alert.note: Alert for Becker; Clay; Clearwater; Hubbard; Mahnomen; Norman; Otter Tail; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 29 at 8:24AM CDT until September 29 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Clay County in northwestern Minnesota... Southwestern Hubbard County in north central Minnesota... Southeastern Norman County in northwestern Minnesota... Northwestern Otter Tail County in west central Minnesota... Northeastern Wilkin County in west central Minnesota... Mahnomen County in northwestern Minnesota... Becker County in northwestern Minnesota... Southwestern Clearwater County in northwestern Minnesota... * Until 900 AM CDT. * At 824 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rollag, or 16 miles west of Detroit Lakes, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Detroit Lakes, Barnesville, Hawley, Mahnomen, Lake Park, Ulen and Toad Lake. This includes Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 11 and 31. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Becker; Clay; Clearwater; Hubbard; Mahnomen; Norman; Otter Tail; Wilkin
